<FI>Set<Fi> the trumpet to thy mouth. <FI>He shall come<Fi> as an eagle against the house of the LORD, because they have transgressed my covenant, and trespassed against my law.<RF>thy: Heb. the roof of thy<Rf>
Israel shall cry unto me, My God, we know thee.
Israel hath cast off <FI>the thing that is<Fi> good: the enemy shall pursue him.
They have set up kings, but not by me: they have made princes, and I knew <FI>it<Fi> not: of their silver and their gold have they made them idols, that they may be cut off.
Thy calf, O Samaria, hath cast <FI>thee<Fi> off; mine anger is kindled against them: how long <FI>will it be<Fi> ere they attain to innocency?
For from Israel <FI>was<Fi> it also: the workman made it; therefore it <FI>is<Fi> not God: but the calf of Samaria shall be broken in pieces.

For they have sown the wind, and they shall reap the whirlwind: it hath no stalk: the bud shall yield no meal: if so be it yield, the strangers shall swallow it up.<RF>stalk: or, standing corn<Rf><CM>
Israel is swallowed up: now shall they be among the Gentiles as a vessel wherein <FI>is<Fi> no pleasure.
For they are gone up to Assyria, a wild ass alone by himself: Ephraim hath hired lovers.<RF>lovers: Heb. loves<Rf>
Yea, though they have hired among the nations, now will I gather them, and they shall sorrow a little for the burden of the king of princes.<RF>sorrow: or, begin<Rf><RF>a…: or, in a little while<Rf>
Because Ephraim hath made many altars to sin, altars shall be unto him to sin.
I have written to him the great things of my law, <FI>but<Fi> they were counted as a strange thing.

They sacrifice flesh <FI>for<Fi> the sacrifices of mine offerings, and eat <FI>it; but<Fi> the LORD accepteth them not; now will he remember their iniquity, and visit their sins: they shall return to Egypt.<RF>They sacrifice…: or, In the sacrifices of mine offerings they, etc<Rf>
For Israel hath forgotten his Maker, and buildeth temples; and Judah hath multiplied fenced cities: but I will send a fire upon his cities, and it shall devour the palaces thereof.<CM>
